mapper.select: select menu_name,menu_num,menu_money from sys_menu where cuisine_id like #{name}
select * from sys_menu where menu_fir like concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
select menu_num from sys_menu where menu_id=#{menuId}
mapper.update: update sys_menu set cuisine_id = #{cuisineId}, menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_money = #{menuMoney}, menu_date = #{menuDate}, menu_num = #{menuNum}, menu_fir = #{menuFir}, menu_mate = #{menuMate}, menu_rem = #{menuRem} where menu_id = #{menuId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from sys_menu order by menu_id
select count(*) from sys_menu where menu_num=0
select count(*) from sys_menu where menu_num<=#{menuNum}
